reviews.text: Thank you so much for your wonderful review, Dion! We‚Äôre thrilled to hear you had such a great time out on the beautiful Whitsunday waters with Sami, Jackson, and Angel. It sounds like she certainly lived up to her name! We love that you enjoyed the Two Island Safari - it‚Äôs such an epic way to explore the islands and soak up a bit of adventure before heading back into Airlie. It‚Äôs fantastic to hear your nephew from the USA had a blast too - sharing the Whitsundays with visiting family makes the day even more special. We‚Äôll be sure to pass on your kind words to the team; they‚Äôll be stoked to know they helped make your experience a memorable one. Thanks again for joining us - we can‚Äôt wait to welcome you back for another ride across the turquoise waters soon! :)
